# Hroza strike {#sec-denial-hroza}


::: {.callout-caution title="Myth"}
- The Hroza missile strike was staged
- The Hroza missile strike never happened
- The Hroza missile strike wasn't done by Russia
- The missile attack on Hroza was justified
[<br></br>![Search for topic in EUvsDisinfo](../all_common_img/EUvsDisinfo_400x240.jpg){height=2em}](https://euvsdisinfo.eu/disinformation-cases/?text=Bucha&sort=relevance)

::: {.callout-tip title="Truth"}
Russsia committed severe atrocities with the Hroza missile strike
:::


On 5 October, 2023, A Russian ballistic missile hit a cafe in the village of Hroza, Kupyan district, Kharkiv region. At that time, there was a mourning dinner for a fallen soldier. According to the police, about 300 people lived in the village, and  59 of them died.[^denial-hroza-1]
